Calculation method: <select name="method">
    <option value="GFNFF">Force field (GFNFF)</option>
    <option value="GFN2xTB">semi-empirical quantum mechanics (GFN2xTB)</option>
    <option value="GFN1xTB">semi-empirical quantum mechanics (GFN1xTB)</option>
</select>

script: Select a predefined collection of molecules:
Color code: vibration - rotation - translation

ops.insert: To get started, you can draw a structure using the structure editor.\   If you already have a structural drawing, you can copy it as SMILES (CMD+SHIFT+C) or Molfile (CMD+SHIFT+O) and paste it using the third icon in the toolbar in the header.\   Once you're done with drawing you can select the level of theory for the simulation and submit the simulation by clicking on the "Run prediction" button.   The prediction might take a few seconds, but after it, you'll see the spectrum and a table with all modes.
